Class Vector2D

  • java.lang.Object
    • Vector2D

  • public class Vector2D
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements a 2D vector.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    theNerd247 (Noah Harvey)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int height
      the number of rows this table contains
      private Vector items
      vector containing vectors (for the 2D affect)
      private int width
      the number of columns this table contains

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Vector2D()
      Constructs a new 2D vector of initial vector-capacity of 10x10
      Vector2D(int width, int height)
      Constructs a new 2D vector of initial vector-capacity of the given dimensions
